name: Banish She
description:
Goal

Find the ectoplasm residue and other useful items. Harness the supernatural energy of the ectoplasm. Use this tho kill the monster that haunts the abandoned orphanage.

Press Spacebar to use the E.M.F magnifying glass to hunt for the ectoplasm.

Remember to hide before the monster gets you!!

(P.S. There is a bug: Items reappear when you leave and enter the room again)
